ProductInfo.Features:
760H Color 1/3" CCD, 6-60mm varifocal lens, 48 pcs IR LEDs with IR distance up to 200ft.
Smart IR function automatically adjusts the infrared light, resulting in a clear image that is not washed out or too dark, good for outdoor and night application. Advanced 2D digital noise reduction (DNR), Auto Tone Reproduction function (ATR). IP 66 weather-proof and vandal-proof
Aluminum housing, white color. Effective pixels: NTSC 768(H) x 494(V). Video scanning type: 2 to 1 interlace. S/N ratio over 50dB (AGC off).
Video Output: 1 BNC, 1.0 Vp-p, 75 Ohm Comp. White balance: ATW / Manual / AWC / PUSH. Auto Gain Control. Digital wide dynamic range. Horizontal flip mirror. DC 12V input voltage
Operating temperature: 14°F ~ 122 °F. Product net weight: 2.5 lbs. Product dimension: 13" X 5" X 8"
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech Long-Range Bullet Camera, 600 TVL, 6-60mm Varifocal Lens, 760H Color 1/3" CCD, 48 pcs Infrared LEDs For Night Vision Up To 200 ft, Weather-Resistant and Vandal-Proof
